Title: Relates to requiring free internet service in households with students who live at or below the poverty level
Summary: Requires free internet service in households with students who live at or below the poverty level; directs broadband companies to install and/or upgrade broadband services in educational facilities.
LawCode: Amd Art 11 Art Head, add ยง224-d, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring free internet service in households with students who live at or below the poverty level
